content:
Name : Meicha (kindergarten girl) from Junior Creative Montessori

her story : Meicha is a Malaysian preschool girl who is bright, kind, and joyful. She 
loves small cute bugs like butterflies and flowers. She enjoys being 
active and loves summer, fresh air, and gentle sunlight. 
She is friendly and could be every child's best friend. She also has a 
strong curiosity in learning new knowledge from her school books and 
asks questions from the kindergarten teachers and her mom. 
Furthermore, she enjoys learning at Junior Creative Montessori and 
aspires to be a wonderful student, knowing that it is a fantastic place to 
learn from the finest!

JCM (Junior Creative Montessori) provides fun, 
nurturing environment for 
Kids to learn and develop. 
JCM strive to cultivate their 

Meicha school beg : Butterfly symbolism of 
transformation, beauty, 
eternal love and rebirth.
Yellow butterflies 
symbolize joyful & 
exuberant. 
The butterfly yellow 
spirit animal reminds 
you that no matter how 
tired or run down you 
feel, you still have 
within you the 
capability to find the 
joy in life.
JCM 
Junior Creative Montessori 
is the official logo for the 
school attire. 
JCM provide a fun, 
nurturing environment for 
kid to learn and develop. 
JCM strive to cultivate their 
imagination, creativity, and 
special talents and interests 
through an integrated theme 
and Montessori approach.

Meicha loves to wear her pink hat: a flower on a hat means she is carefree, in high spirits. 
happy go lucky, having no worries in the world, peace.

so this is her details.
Imagination, creativity, and 
special talents and interests 
through an integrated theme 
and Montessori approach
